full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Reference Number: cb-741-52615627
### Solicitation Number: 30006346
### Publication Date: 2024-11-07

### Tender Details
| Field | Value | 
| --- | --- | 
| Tender Status | Open | 
| Tender Category | Construction Services | 
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price | 

### Tender Description
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking bids for a marine construction service. The successful bidder will be responsible for:

- Hauling and disposing of dredge spoil material from the containment cell at the public wharf in Le Goulet, Gloucester Co., NB.
- Leveling of the north section of the wharf.
- Excavating the existing dredging material in the confinement cell.
- Haulage of the excavated material to the disposal site.
- Restoring the site and access to the site.
- Cleansing the site access path and road.

### Work Scope
The work shall include all labor, products, construction materials, and services necessary to complete the project in accordance with the contractual documents. Only items listed in the Unit Price Table will be measured for payment. Incidental work will not be separately measured for payment.
